Table__Delete__ActionRow: (state, extData, errors, event, rowData) => { (async function() {    const { data } = await extData.__?.httpClient?.deleteMethod(`configuration/ConfigDetail/Delete?id=${rowData.Id}`);    })(); }
DialogAdd__BeforeOpenDialog: (state, extData, errors, event, tempState) => { return async function() {   const formRes = await extData.__?.formHelper.getFormByCode('Admin_ConfigDetail_Add');     return {formDef: formRes, initState: { ConfigID: state.Id } }    }; }
DialogUpdate__BeforeOpenDialog: (state, extData, errors, event, tempState) => { return async function() { const formRes = await extData.__?.formHelper.getFormByCode('Admin_ConfigDetail_Edit');   const { data } = await extData.__?.httpClient?.getMethod(`configuration/ConfigDetail/GetById?id=${tempState.Id}`); return {formDef: formRes, initState: data } }; }
